com.rastkosprojects.springbootecommerce.dao

Interface StateRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<State,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<State,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<State,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<State>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<State,java.lang.Integer>

    @CrossOrigin(value="http://localhost:4200")
public interface StateRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<State,java.lang.Integer>
    Interface which represents the DAO to the State objects. Spring Data REST scans the repository and automatically opens endpoints.
    Author:
    rastko
